abstract: United Nations announces that its troops have launched both airstrikes and ground offensive with Congolese troops targeting leftovers of Burundian rebel group National Liberation Forces; offensive is also meant to pave way for another offensive against Democratic Forces for Liberation of Rwanda.
lead_paragraph: United Nations and Congolese troops launched airstrikes and a ground offensive against remnants of a Burundian rebel group based in an eastern region of the Democratic Republic of Congo, a United Nations military spokesman said.
snippet: United Nations and Congolese troops launched airstrikes and a ground offensive against remnants of a Burundian rebel group based in an eastern region of the Democratic Republic of Congo, a United Nations military spokesman said.

keywords.value: Democratic Forces for the Liberation of Rwanda
